title: UrlHandlingStrategy
contents:
API > @angular/router
mode_edit code

UrlHandlingStrategylink

提供一種將 AngularJS 應用程式遷移到 Angular 的方法。

Provides a way to migrate AngularJS applications to Angular.

abstract class UrlHandlingStrategy { abstract shouldProcessUrl(url: UrlTree): boolean abstract extract(url: UrlTree): UrlTree abstract merge(newUrlPart: UrlTree, rawUrl: UrlTree): UrlTree }

方法link

shouldProcessUrl() link

mode_edit code

告訴路由器是否應處理此 URL。

Tells the router if this URL should be processed.
abstract shouldProcessUrl(url: UrlTree): boolean
引數
url UrlTree
返回值

boolean

當返回 true 時，路由器將執行常規導航。當返回 false 時，路由器會將路由器狀態設定為空狀態。結果，所有活動元件都將被破壞。

When it returns true, the router will execute the regular navigation. When it returns false, the router will set the router state to an empty state. As a result, all the active components will be destroyed.

extract() link

mode_edit code

提取應由路由器處理的 URL 部分。 URL 的其餘部分將保持不變。

Extracts the part of the URL that should be handled by the router. The rest of the URL will remain untouched.
abstract extract(url: UrlTree): UrlTree
引數
url UrlTree
返回值

UrlTree

merge() link

mode_edit code

將 URL 片段與 URL 的其餘部分合並。

Merges the URL fragment with the rest of the URL.
abstract merge(newUrlPart: UrlTree, rawUrl: UrlTree): UrlTree
引數
newUrlPart UrlTree
rawUrl UrlTree
返回值

UrlTree
